name: BobNet Email Simulator
description: Heroku app to simulate email opens/clicks from inbound emails via Mailgun (FastAPI + RabbitMQ).

CLOUDAMQP_URL.description: (required) RabbitMQ connection URL from CloudAMQP. Format: amqps://user:pass@host/vhost

MAILGUN_SIGNING_KEY.description: (optional) Mailgun HTTP webhook signing key for signature verification. Get from Mailgun dashboard > Settings > API Security.

MAILGUN_DOMAIN.description: (optional) Restrict Mailgun webhook to recipients at this domain (e.g., inbound.example.com).

SIMULATE_WITH_BROWSER.description: Use headless browser for opens (false = direct fetch).
